product_name: The North Face Zipline Rain Jacket - Boys' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Watperoof yet breathabke, The North Face Zipline rain jacket for boys is a great choice for kids who won't let rainy weather get in the way of adventure. HyVent(R) 2-layer construction offers waterproof, breathable, seam-sealed protection; polyester mesh lining wicks moisture from body to keep him warm and dry on the inside. Full-length front zipper features a stormflap to keep the chill out. Attached hood; elastic cuffs; zippered handwarmer pockets. Closeout.
short_description: Watperoof yet breathabke, The North Face Zipline rain jacket for boys is a great choice for kids who won't let rainy weather get in the way of adventure.
